text: Eugene "Goo" Kennedy (August 23, 1949December 8, 2020) was an American professional basketball player. He was born in Charlotte, North Carolina. Kennedy played four seasons in the American Basketball Association as a member of the Dallas Chaparrals, San Antonio Spurs, Spirits of St. Louis, and Utah Stars. He then played one season in the National Basketball Association with the Houston Rockets. Kennedy died at age 71 on December 8, 2020 in Texas. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:San Antonio Spurs players Category:Houston Rockets players Category:Sportspeople from Charlotte, North Carolina
title: Goo Kennedy
